auth.termsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noDataYet: No data yet. Start by recording your mood!

chat.title: Professional's Assistant
chat.disclaimer: This assistant is a professional's support tool. It does not replace professional mental health care.
chat.welcome: I'm your mental health professional's assistant. I'm here to listen. Tell me how you're feeling today or what's on your mind.

emergency.title: Attention Needed
emergency.message: We detected you might be going through a difficult time.
emergency.notAlone: You are not alone. Help is available.
emergency.confirmDismiss: Are you sure you want to continue?

referral.title: Professional Attention Required
referral.message: We've detected that you need personalized professional attention.
referral.explanation: For your wellbeing, we ask that you contact the professional directly. Chat will be available again once you've had the opportunity to connect with her.
referral.availableAgain: Chat will be available again on {date}

referralForm.title: Connect with the professional
referralForm.description: Fill in your details so the professional can reach out to you. You can continue using the chat for 2 more days.
referralForm.privacy: Your data is sent directly to the professional and is not shared with third parties.
referralForm.successMessage: The professional will receive your data and get in touch with you. You can continue using the chat for 2 more days.

onboarding.step1Description: Ego-Core helps you understand and manage your emotions with the support of artificial intelligence.
onboarding.step2Description: Track your mood, energy, and sleep patterns.
onboarding.step3Description: Receive analysis and suggestions based on your emotional patterns.
onboarding.step4Description: Your data is encrypted and anonymized. You have full control over your information.

consent.title: Before we begin
consent.subtitle: Please read and accept the terms of use for the assistant.
consent.section1: Ego-Core is an artificial intelligence assistant that works as a support tool for a psychology professional. It is NOT a therapy, diagnosis, or mental health treatment service.
consent.section2: If the assistant detects that you need professional attention, it will ask for your contact information so the professional can reach out to you. After referral, chat will be available for 2 more days.
consent.section3: Your conversations are processed by artificial intelligence. Personal information is anonymized before processing. Your contact data is only shared with the professional when you complete the referral form.
consent.section4: In case of emergency or crisis, contact your local emergency services or crisis hotline. This assistant does not replace professional mental health care.
consent.acceptTerms: I have read and accept the terms of use. I understand that this assistant does not replace professional care.

csvUpload.title: Import data (CSV)
csvUpload.description: Upload a CSV file with mood records. Columns must follow this format:
csvUpload.dropzone: Drag a .csv file here or click to select

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: Session expired. Please sign in again.
